skillTree.localised_description: A beautifully designed Mechanical Steed made of pure gold by the industrious city of Nuln. This golden mount is a gift from the University of Salzenmund which she has dutifully served as a professor for many years.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.

As intelligent as she is, Sabine is not known for her patience with those of lesser intellectual fibre. She understands the theoretical importance of emotion, but she takes pride in approaching the world logically and objectively.

One morning, Sabine made a troubling discovery. A small golden feather had sprouted from her forearm. Though her long robes cover the concerning deformity from the public eye, the possible implications have left her shaken. Could this be a simple mutation? A gift from the Gods perhaps? Or something far, far worse..?

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +3
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +6
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +9
	(own army)

skillTree.localised_description: At the age of just 5 years old, Sabine had mastered both literacy and arithmetic, far outstripping her tutors. By her early teens, she had mastered engineering and cosmography, far outstripping her professors at the University of Nuln. As an adult, she became a leading scholar in the alchemical applications of silver, far outstripping her irritated colleagues at the Grand Orrery. Sabine’s limitless value as a career academic is indispensable to the Colleges of Magic.

effects.description: Duration: +20% for "Transmutation of Lead", "Plague of Rust", "Glittering Robe"

skillTree.localised_description: Transmutation is a powerful gift, a gift that Sabine does not waste. Using a relative pittance of gold coins, Sabine can quickly remove flaws in weapons and mend dull blades in large batches.

effects.description:
Base weapon damage: -4
	(all units in army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: It is a trivial task for as talented an alchemist as Sabine to enchant a simple blade.

Every good alchemist needs their own lab to perform experiments in. Sabine is never without hers, carrying a jumbled assortment of ingredients and tools on her person whenever she is away from her office.
Spells and charms have made this enchanted armour nigh-impenetrable to ordinary blades.

effects.description: Enables passive ability "Armour of Meteoric Iron"

Construction cost: -15% for all buildings
	(local province)
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: A ghostly bow appears in the hand of the caster and hurls silver arrows at the foe.

effects.description: Cost: -2 for "Silver Arrows of Arha Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Glittering Robe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: Sabine extracts the essence of Chamon from the armour of her enemies and the ground around her, briefly turning the flesh of her enemies into metal.
Nearby winds of magic are drawn to a central locus and converted into a powerful burst of energy.

A long history of magical incidents and mishaps have led Sabine to devise a response to any magical hazard she might encounter, along with a quick and efficient means to swiftly banish beasts from beyond.

Those with little knowledge in the arcane believe that wizards possess an innate “Magical Sense” where they can detect items attuned to the Winds. In truth, most wizards attain a talent for spotting magical qualities in an item through experience and knowledge.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +10%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +10%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +20%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +20%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +30%
Magic item drop chance from battle: +30%

skillTree.localised_description: A wise sorcerer will always maintain a magical aura around themselves, even when unarmoured.
A burst of raw magical energy flings those around the caster with brutal force.
Like all Gold Wizards, Sabine wears a stylised golden mask. However, hers is not to cover any scars or disfigurations, but to maintain a sense of anonymity even amongst the few closest to her.
With a single touch, their precious treasury will be no more…

skillTree.localised_description: Brass and copper can be temporarily transmuted to gold. Perfect for fooling unsuspecting marks.

skillTree.localised_description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

item_set.name: Field Laboratory
item_set.description: Every good alchemist needs their own lab to perform experiments in. Sabine is never without hers, carrying a jumbled assortment of ingredients and tools on her person whenever she is away from her office.

items.colour_text: A hefty book containing spells and incantations of Chamon. Enclosed within these pages are thousands of scrawled, illegible notes detailing Sabine’s presumably ingenious solutions to contemporary limitations in the magical resource economy.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Considered a prodigy in magic and alchemy, Sabine has quickly made herself a prominent and well-connected figure in Nordlander society. Her talents are sorely missed by the Grand Orrery.
